item.title: Russia’s Lavrov Says West Trying to ‘Block' Ukraine Peace Talks
item.description: The FM also accused Ukrainian authorities of 'attempts to disrupt the process that was laid down by Presidents Putin and Trump.'

item.title: Drone Shot Down by Russia Sparks Fire at Kursk Nuclear Plant
item.description: The “device detonated” upon impact at the Kursk Nuclear Power Plant, sparking a blaze which the facility said “was extinguished by fire crews.”

item.title: Kyrgyzstan Mission to Rescue Russian Climber Suspended
item.description: Natalia Nagovitsyna broke her leg while climbing the 7,439-meter Victory Peak and has been stranded in the mountains for 11 days.
